alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 1:14PM MST until January 14 at 4:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 4 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet, East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet and Southern Gila Region Highlands/Black Range. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 4 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range
